overview:
Jossi is responsible for Brevity’s operations and business execution in the West Coast, including business development, client deployments, account management, and support.

Jossi is a high-impact media technology executive with over 20 years of strategic, operational and senior management experience. With diverse international technical and business skills garnered in extended periods in Israel, Europe, United Kingdom and the United Sates, Jossi brings to Brevity his combined experience in technology and business development.

As a co-founder and serving as Director of Technology of MediaForum, Inc. and UCM Ltd. in the UK, Jossi led R&D and business development of digital media asset management technologies for Fortune 500 companies. Over the last years acting as Director of Technology and Director of Online Services in the non-profit sector, Jossi led technology, strategic and operational planning by fostering innovation, building and mentoring cross-functional teams, and coordinating the development, deployment, and management of global online systems across the organizations he served.
